message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that's worth a lot to me, I'm looking to get at least $115 for it.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only able to pay $105 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $105 isn't quite enough for me. How about we split the difference at $110? This would be a fair price for both of us.
